title: Star Guardian Ahri Figure
body: I ordered this as soon as it went live, however, my concern is that it was said that it shipped January 1st, and it's now the 16th, and I still haven't recieved mine? I have multiple emails so I don't recall which one I used.

replies.body: I'd definitely reach out to the billing agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Help & Support doesn't deal with billing or payments, but those billing agents have all the tools to let you know precisely what's going on.

I'd check with your payment processor and track it that way  1st. You can also submit a support ticket with your most commonly used email and give them your order info and receipt. That should speed things up nicely.
